item.title: By: Damian Legawiec
item.dc:creator: Damian Legawiec
item.description: Hey Tony You can find the development roadmap for future Spree releases here -> https://github.com/spree/spree/milestones?direction=asc&sort=due_date&state=open . We're fully transparent in terms of our vision and goals. Everyone can comment, share their ideas and contribute! Best, Damian
item.content:encoded:
Hey Tony
You can find the development roadmap for future Spree releases here -> https://github.com/spree/spree/milestones?direction=asc&sort=due_date&state=open . We’re fully transparent in terms of our vision and goals. Everyone can comment, share their ideas and contribute!
Best,
Damian
